<hur>.name: Hur
<hur>.info: He is a seasoned actor known for his commanding presence and powerful emotional range. His intense gaze and mature charisma make him a standout in dramatic roles.

<kong>.name: Kong
<kong>.info: A fresh and youthful actress, she radiates natural beauty and subtle charisma. Her expressive eyes suggest both innocence and emotional sensitivity.

<moon>.name: Moon
<moon>.info: She is a graceful and composed actress with a timeless elegance. Her confident smile and refined presence reflect her experience in diverse roles.

<sul>.name: Sul
<sul>.info: With his dignified suit and serious expression, he exudes professionalism and authority. Often cast in leadership or villain roles, his strong aura commands attention.
